quote: The story so far:

quote: If you don't know where you're going, any road'll take you there

quote: We're all human, aren't we? Every human life is worth the same, and worth saving.

author: Suzanne Collins

quote: It takes ten times as long to put yourself back together as it does to fall apart.

quote: We love the things we love for what they are.

quote: I refuse to answer that question on the grounds that I don't know the answer

quote: The weak can never forgive. Forgiveness is the attribute of the strong.

quote: Wit beyond measure is man's greatest treasure.

quote: Lock up your libraries if you like; but there is no gate, no lock, no bolt that you can set upon the freedom of my mind.

author: Sam Levenson
quote: For attractive lips, speak words of kindness.

quote: You cannot find peace by avoiding life.

quote: I carry your heart with me I carry it in my heartI am never without it anywhere

quote: Don't think or judge, just listen.

quote: All that we see or seem is but a dream within a dream.

author: Suzanne Collins
quote: Happy Hunger Games! And may the odds be ever in your favor.

quote: The Christian does not think God will love us because we are good, but that God will make us good because He loves us.

quote: We are only as strong as we are united, as weak as we are divided.

quote: What lies behind us and what lies before us are tiny matters compared to what lies within us.

quote: The only thing worse than a boy who hates you: a boy that loves you.

quote: Never doubt that a small group of thoughtful, committed, citizens can change the world. Indeed, it is the only thing that ever has.

quote: Indifference and neglect often do much more damage than outright dislike.

author: Marilyn Monroe

quote: Loyalty to country ALWAYS. Loyalty to government, when it deserves it.

quote: But I don't want to go among mad people, Alice remarked.

author: William Shakespeare

author: Anne Rice

quote: You wouldn't worry so much about what others think of you if you realized how seldom they do.

author: Cassandra Clare
quote: Will looked horrified. What kind of monster could possibly hate chocolate?

quote: You have your way. I have my way. As for the right way, the correct way, and the only way, it does not exist.

author: F. Scott Fitzgerald
quote: Show me a hero, and I'll write you a tragedy.

author: Plato
quote: Wise men speak because they have something to say; fools because they have to say something.

author: Mark Twain
quote: Truth is stranger than fiction, but it is because Fiction is obliged to stick to possibilities; Truth isn't.

author: Chuck Palahniuk
quote: I don't want to die without any scars.

author: E.E. Cummings

quote: I never travel without my diary. One should always have something sensational to read in the train.

quote: She generally gave herself very good advice, though she very seldom followed it.

quote: One day, in retrospect, the years of struggle will strike you as the most beautiful.

quote: Fear doesn't shut you down; it wakes you up

quote: I've got a stele we can use. Who wants to do me?

quote: The road to hell is paved with adverbs.

quote: Fire is catching! And if we burn, you burn with us!

author: Walt Whitman

author: Albert Camus
quote: Should I kill myself, or have a cup of coffee?

quote: Love doesn't just sit there, like a stone, it has to be made, like bread; remade all the time, made new.

quote: It was love at first sight, at last sight, at ever and ever sight.

quote: Can I help you with something?

quote: Deadlines just aren't real to me until I'm staring one in the face.

quote: Ever had a flying burrito hit you? Well, it's a deadly projectile, right up there with cannonballs and grenades.

quote: My dear,

quote: Wow, Thalia muttered. Apollo is hot.

quote: God has no religion.

quote: I was never really insane except upon occasions when my heart was touched.

quote: Be careful of love. It'll twist your brain around and leave you thinking up is down and right is wrong.

quote: The truth does not change according to our ability to stomach it.

quote: Do you think I'm pretty?
